channel.title: Books Phone War Birthday Dad Phones on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Books Phone War Birthday Dad Phones on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: whatever... i do what i want..
item.description: So I have been reading a lot of african literature. it is so nice. I really needed somethign that would make me smile again. all my books had gotten stale. so it was a nice change.. This weekend was strangely lonely. I just sat around. even when I was out.. it wasn’t exactly thrilling. I did get my project done. which was cool.. and received good word from its recepients. but.
